name: Rosebud AI
headline: Make games at the speed of thought.
description:
Rosebud is building the AI Roblox. We will make it 1000X easier for a community of game devs to create and enjoy the games of their dreams.
‍
We’re a team of PhD researchers, creatives and engineers building the generative AI platform to enable game creation at the speed of thought. We believe all media creation will be done via generative methods in a few years. We're building that future.
tags: industry:artificial-intelligence; industry:developer-tools; industry:generative-ai; industry:machine-learning; industry:gaming; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Lisha Li, Founder
founders.description:
Building Rosebud AI. 
Machine Learning PhD UC Berkeley, turned AI investor (principal @ Amplify Partners) turned founder.

generated_description:
**Rosebud AI: Revolutionizing Game Development**

Rosebud AI, founded in 2019 and part of Y Combinator’s S19 batch, aims to transform the world of game development. The company's mission is simple yet ambitious: "Make games at the speed of thought." Located in the heart of San Francisco, this innovative startup consists of a tight-knit team of 10 PhD researchers, creatives, and engineers dedicated to harnessing the power of generative AI for game creation.

### The Vision

Initially launched as a platform likened to "AI Roblox," Rosebud AI is striving to democratize game development. They're working to make it 1000 times easier for developers and gamers alike to bring their dream games to life. The team believes we're on the brink of a future where all media creation will pivot towards generative techniques. They're not just envisioning this future—they're building it.

### Key Offerings

Rosebud AI provides a suite of powerful tools:

1. **3D Game Maker**: This feature helps users create immersive worlds through an intuitive interface.
2. **Visual Novel Maker**: Users can craft interactive narratives and engage with AI characters, creating a unique interactive experience.
3. **AI NPCs and Characters**: Create dynamic non-player characters and engage in dialogues with AI characters that can adapt and respond.
4. **Educational Tools**: The platform enables students to explore game development creatively, enhancing learning through interactive projects.

With their tools, users can go from mere text descriptions to fully playable role-playing games (RPGs), making creativity more accessible than ever.

### User-Centric Approach

Rosebud AI thrives on the feedback of its users. Gamers and developers from various backgrounds share their success stories—testimonies highlight how Rosebud has transformed their approach to game development. Users express gratitude for the platform's ability to enable rapid iteration and creative exploration, fostering a newfound passion for game creation.

### Looking Ahead

With a clear outlook on the future—blending creativity with the latest advancements in AI—Rosebud AI is plotting a course that could redefine how games are made. By prioritizing speed and accessibility, they are positioned not only to lead in the gaming industry but to revolutionize it entirely.

For more information on their offerings or to dive into the future of game development, check out their [official website](http://rosebud.ai). Whether you’re a seasoned developer or just starting, Rosebud AI invites you to craft your virtual worlds with unprecedented ease.
